edu.uci.calismall

Class Painter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uci.calismall.Painter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Painter
extends Object
implements Runnable
    The task executed by the thread that draws the view.
    Author:
    Michele Bonazza

      Constructor and Description
      Painter(SurfaceHolder holder, CaliView view)

    • Field Detail

      • SCREEN_REFRESH_TIME

        public static final long SCREEN_REFRESH_TIME
        Time in milliseconds between two consecutive screen refreshes (i.e. two consecutive calls to CaliView.drawView(Canvas)). To get the FPS that this value sets, just divide 1000 by the value (so a SCREEN_REFRESH_TIME of 20 translates to 50 FPS).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Painter

        Painter(SurfaceHolder holder,
       CaliView view)
        Creates a new painter that will retrieve a Canvas from the argument holder and pass it to the argument view by means of CaliView.drawView(Canvas) calls.
        Parameters:
        holder - the SurfaceHolder from which canvas instances will be retrieved through SurfaceHolder.lockCanvas() calls
        view - the view to be drawn onto the canvas

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • stopForFileOpen

        void stopForFileOpen(Lock lock,
                   Condition waitingCondition,
                   Condition signalCondition)
        Requests for the Painter thread to stop drawing the associated CaliView until the file opener thread is done.
        Parameters:
        lock - the lock that must be acquired to communicate with the opener thread
        waitingCondition - the condition on which the painter must Condition.await()
        signalCondition - the condition that the painter must Condition.signal() right before going to sleep

      • isWaiting

        boolean isWaiting()
        Returns whether this painter is currently waiting for the opener thread to be done.
        Returns:
        true if this thread is currently sleeping
